Claim: "Human civilization might collapse in coming decades due to climate change."
Implication: "A former Australian defense chief and senior royal navy commander endorses the scenario analysis."
Formula: (exists a (exists b (IsAffectedByClimateChange(b) and (IsWarmingUp(a) or IsRisingSeaLevels(a))))) -> (exists a (IsFormer(a) and EndorsesScenarioAnalysis(a)))
